sentence: we came here on a crowded saturday night and were seated right away despite being 15 minutes late for our reservation.
we decided to eat in tea room which was small and cute.
we did notice however, that some tables had what looked like pita instead of naan.
we split a tasty vegetable samosa and the malai tikka wrap.
we were seated at the sushi bar in front of yasuda.
we were tired and cold when we got to the restaurant, then we sat down to begin ordering appetizers.
word of advice, save room for pasta dishes and never leave until you've had the tiramisu.
would have rather tried terrace in the sky or water club for that price
you can actually get 2 salads worth if u take it home and add it to some lettuce!
yourself a favor and have dinner here and see if you dont agree with me.
